item.title: Introduction
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Hi hi ðŸ‘‹ You can call me Yayoi, all of my friends do. I am 39 years old and I live on the west coast in the USA. Just over two years ago I discovered, or rather, re-discovered the MMO Fiesta Online with friends. I was completely addicted ðŸ¤ª If I'm honest, Fiesta Online isn't exactly the best game in the world. Its grindy and it can be hard to solo, but I've made friends and just can't seem to leave them.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
